1525300.name: Redout: Space Assault Soundtrack
1525300.description:
The Redout: Space Assault Original Soundtrack by Aram Jean Shahbazians and Leonardo Mazzella, produced by Paolo Armao, features more than 70 minutes of music created exclusively for the game, fully remastered for this release and with all-new bonus material.

Credits

Composers: Aram Jean Shahbazians, Leonardo Mazzella
Mix: Leonardo Mazzella, Aram Jean Shahbazians
Producer: Paolo Armao
Recording Studio: Zero dB Sound Studios - Turin, Italy
Musicians: Daniel Giagnorio (guitar)

- MP3-format (320kbps) files will be placed in your RSA folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\music\RSA - Soundtrack
- Lossless format (Wav, 44kHz, 16bit) files will be placed, compressed in a single zip file, in your RSA folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\music\RSA - Soundtrack\HQ
